channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Elastic Storage Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Elastic Storage Server

item.title: CVE-2020-4383|2024-08-04T08:00:07.387Z -- ibm -- elastic%20storage%20server
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale for IBM Elastic Storage Server 5.3.0 through 5.3.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service during deployment while configuring some of the network services. IBM X-Force ID: 179165.

item.title: CVE-2020-4382|2024-08-04T08:00:07.328Z -- ibm -- elastic%20storage%20server
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale for IBM Elastic Storage Server 5.3.0 through 5.3.5 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service during deployment or upgrade pertaining to xcat services. IBM X-Force ID: 179163.

item.title: CVE-2020-4381|2024-08-04T08:00:07.331Z -- ibm -- elastic%20storage%20server
item.description: IBM Spectrum Scale for IBM Elastic Storage Server 5.3.0 through 5.3.6 could allow an authenticated user to cause a denial of service during deployment or upgrade if GUI specific services are enabled. IBM X-Force ID: 179162.
